"""Example extra endpoints for plugins."""


import flask
import flask.views




[docs]
class InView(flask.views.MethodView):
    """Example View.

    A view that implements a GET endpoint that returns a JSON message.
    """



[docs]
    def get(self):
        """GET Endpoint."""
        return flask.jsonify({"message": "This is an internal endpoint."})
